name: Charlotte (educational version)
description:
Charlotte is a first person horror, story exploration game based on the 19th century short story by Charlotte Perkins Gilman.

Extinct Angel is a not for profit company and part of the research center at MAGIC, Rochester Institute of Technology. All proceeds are used to make more games!

Charlotte Official Release Trailer

Note: This is the educational version which does NOT contain examples of 19th century erotica. For the full, NSFW version, go to https://magicspellstudios.itch.io/charlotte
